summary: Stop enemy hitting you from 4 meters away...
descriptionHtml:
Dramatically reduces weapons' hitting reaches to more realistic values. No more enemy hitting you from 4-5 meters away. Can't help Skyrims faulty combat system, but at least this mod makes it much better.

Reaches in some cases differ, but this gives an idea what has been done, these are the base stats from where I started, then made some adjustements. Weapons' reaches are calculated relative to each other.

Greatswords 1.3 > 1.1
Shortswords 1.0 > 0.6
Swords 1.0 > 0.75
Battleaxes/hammers 1.3 > 0.95
Katanas 1.0 > 0.95
Maces 1.0 > 0.6
War Axes 0.7 > 0.6
Daggers 0.7 > 0.4

There are some little adjustements in some weapons, for example Iron Dagger has reach of 0.3, some other weapons have different reaches too.

If you think some weapon needs to be adjusted, feel free to tell, so I can make the changes.
author: DenassaG
